titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Eunice H. Hannan scrapbook

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Eunice H. Hannan (1899-1981) was a graduate of the University of Michigan in 1923, receiving her Bachelor of Arts in Education. She married Lynn S. Gordon, also a University of Michigan class of 1923 graduate, and taught in high schools in the Detroit area after her graduation.
archdesc.scopecontent: Scrapbook that Hannan kept while a student of the University of Michigan. Included in this scrapbook are programs collected from various events at the University of Michigan, a detailed list of theater shows and other entertainments with notes, photographs of Hannan and her classmates, and her grade cards while at the University of Michigan.
